metadata.description: Identifier for the project, customer or application -=- PLEASE ONLY USE LOWER CASE AND NUMBERS -=-
Resourcegroup name where VMs are deployed (used for demo saved searches) -=- PLEASE ONLY USE LOWER CASE AND NUMBERS -=-
Can one of the following, dev-test-acc-prod
Unique number to add to the name of the accounts.
Number of retention days in the PerGB2018 pricing tier (31-730).
The region or location where resources will be deployed

variables.TemplateDescription: Added saved search for maintenance mode
variables.TemplateUsage: Is used to setup a base monitoring environment.

properties.notes: Automation account should not be deleted.

properties.query:
ConfigurationChange
| where TimeGenerated > ago(60d)
| where ConfigChangeType == "WindowsServices" 
| where SvcDisplayName == "Maintenance Mode Ongoing" 
| where ChangeCategory == "Added" or ChangeCategory == "Removed" 
| order by Computer , TimeGenerated asc
| project Computer , ChangeCategory , TimeGenerated 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Computer
| where ChangeCategory == "Added" 
| project Computer 
| distinct Computer

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
ConfigurationChange
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) 
| where ConfigChangeType == "WindowsServices" 
| where SvcDisplayName == "Windows Firewall"
| where SvcChangeType == "State"
| where SvcPreviousState == "Running"
| where SvcState <> "Running"
| summarize AggregatedValue=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer')]

properties.Query:
[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
Perf
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" 
| where CounterName == "% Free Space" 
| where InstanceName <> "HarddiskVolume1" and InstanceName <> "_Total" and InstanceName <> "C:"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(15m)
| summarize PercentFree=avg(CounterValue) by Computer
| where PercentFree < 10')]

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
ConfigurationChange
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) 
| where ConfigChangeType == "WindowsServices" 
| where SvcDisplayName == "DHCP Client"
| where SvcChangeType == "State"
| where SvcPreviousState == "Running"
| where SvcState <> "Running"
| summarize AggregatedValue=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer')]

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
Heartbeat 
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| summarize LastHeartbeat=max(TimeGenerated) by Computer 
| where LastHeartbeat < ago(3m)')]

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
ConfigurationChange
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(30m) 
| where ConfigChangeType == "WindowsServices" 
| where SvcDisplayName == "DNS Client"
| where SvcChangeType == "State"
| where SvcPreviousState == "Running"
| where SvcState <> "Running"
| summarize AggregatedValue=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer')]

NetworkMonitoring 
| where TestName == "AzVnet2OnPrem"
| where (SubType == "EndpointHealth" or SubType == "EndpointPath")
| where (LossHealthState == "Unhealthy" or LatencyHealthState == "Unhealthy" or ServiceResponseHealthState == "Unhealthy" or LatencyHealthState == "Unhealthy")

| where (SubType == "EndpointHealth" or SubType == "EndpointPath")
| where (LossHealthState == "Unhealthy" or LatencyHealthState == "Unhealthy" or ServiceResponseHealthState == "Unhealthy" or LatencyHealthState == "Unhealthy")

| where (SubType == "EndpointHealth" or SubType == "EndpointPath")
| where (LossHealthState == "Unhealthy" or LatencyHealthState == "Unhealthy" or ServiceResponseHealthState == "Unhealthy" or LatencyHealthState == "Unhealthy")

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Pods that are failing or recovered from failure
properties.Query:
[concat('KubeEvents 
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '"
| where ObjectKind =~ "Pod"
| where Reason =~ "BackOff"
| project TimeGenerated, Count, Computer
| summarize AggregatedValue=sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer')]

[concat('KubeEvents 
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '"
| where Reason =~ "Evicted"
| project TimeGenerated, Count, Computer
| summarize AggregatedValue=sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Storage related issues have been detected
properties.Query:
[concat('KubeEvents 
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '"
| where Reason =~ "FailedMount" or Reason =~ "FailedAttachVolume" 
| project TimeGenerated, Count, Computer
| summarize AggregatedValue=sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer ')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Scheduler unable to find node to run pod
properties.Query:
[concat('KubeEvents 
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '"
| where Reason =~ "FailedScheduling"
| project TimeGenerated, Count, ClusterName
| summarize AggregatedValue=sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), ClusterName')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Node not ready or not schedulable
properties.Query:
[concat('KubeEvents 
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '"
| where Reason =~ "NodeNotReady" or Reason =~ "NodeNotSchedulable" 
| project TimeGenerated, Count, Computer
| summarize AggregatedValue=sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer ')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Too many failures detected in short time-span
properties.Query:
[concat('KubeEvents 
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '"
| where Reason contains "Fail"
| project TimeGenerated, Count, ClusterName
| summarize AggregatedValue=sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), ClusterName')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Nodes average CPU utilization in percent (Critical)
properties.Query:
[concat('let endDateTime = now();
let startDateTime = ago(60m);
let trendBinSize = 15m;
let capacityCounterName = "cpuCapacityNanoCores";
let usageCounterName = "cpuUsageNanoCores";
KubeNodeInventory
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '" 
| distinct ClusterName, Computer
| join hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == capacityCounterName
| summarize LimitValue = max(CounterValue) by Computer, CounterName, bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize)
| project Computer, CapacityStartTime = TimeGenerated, CapacityEndTime = TimeGenerated + trendBinSize, LimitValue
) on Computer
| join kind=inner hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime + trendBinSize
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime - trendBinSize
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == usageCounterName
| project Computer, UsageValue = CounterValue, TimeGenerated
) on Computer
| where TimeGenerated >= CapacityStartTime and TimeGenerated < CapacityEndTime
| project ClusterName, Computer, TimeGenerated, UsagePercent = UsageValue * 100.0 / LimitValue
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(UsagePercent) by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Nodes average memory utilization in percent (Critical)
properties.Query:
[concat('let endDateTime = now();
let startDateTime = ago(60m);
let trendBinSize = 15m;
let capacityCounterName = "memoryCapacityBytes";
let usageCounterName = "memoryRssBytes";
KubeNodeInventory
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| where ClusterName =~ "', 'K8SClusterName', '" 
| distinct ClusterName, Computer
| join hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == capacityCounterName
| summarize LimitValue = max(CounterValue) by Computer, CounterName, bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize)
| project Computer, CapacityStartTime = TimeGenerated, CapacityEndTime = TimeGenerated + trendBinSize, LimitValue
) on Computer
| join kind=inner hint.strategy=shuffle (
Perf
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime + trendBinSize
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime - trendBinSize
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == usageCounterName
| project Computer, UsageValue = CounterValue, TimeGenerated
) on Computer
| where TimeGenerated >= CapacityStartTime and TimeGenerated < CapacityEndTime
| project ClusterName, Computer, TimeGenerated, UsagePercent = UsageValue * 100.0 / LimitValue
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(UsagePercent) by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), Computer
//| where AggregatedValue <= 95
| order by TimeGenerated asc ')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Percent failing Pods is too high
properties.Query:
[concat('let endDateTime = now();
let startDateTime = ago(60m);
let trendBinSize = 15m;
let clusterName = "', 'K8SClusterName', '";
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| where ClusterName == clusterName
| distinct ClusterName, TimeGenerated
| summarize ClusterSnapshotCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), ClusterName
| join hint.strategy=broadcast (
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| distinct ClusterName, Computer, PodUid, TimeGenerated, PodStatus
| summarize TotalCount = count(),
PendingCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Pending"),
RunningCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Running"),
SucceededCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Succeeded"),
FailedCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Failed")
by ClusterName, bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize)
) on ClusterName, TimeGenerated
| extend UnknownCount = TotalCount - PendingCount - RunningCount - SucceededCount - FailedCount
| project TimeGenerated, ClusterName,
TotalCount = todouble(TotalCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
PendingCount = todouble(PendingCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
PendingPercent = round((todouble(PendingCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)), 
RunningCount = todouble(RunningCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
RunningPercent = round((todouble(RunningCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)),
SucceededCount = todouble(SucceededCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
SucceededPercent = round((todouble(SucceededCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)),
FailedCount = todouble(FailedCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
FailedPercent = round((todouble(FailedCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)),
UnknownCount = todouble(UnknownCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
UnknownPercent = round((todouble(UnknownCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100))
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(FailedPercent) by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), ClusterName')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Percent unknown Pods is too high
properties.Query:
[concat('let endDateTime = now();
let startDateTime = ago(60m);
let trendBinSize = 15m;
let clusterName = "', 'K8SClusterName', '";
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| where ClusterName == clusterName
| distinct ClusterName, TimeGenerated
| summarize ClusterSnapshotCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), ClusterName
| join hint.strategy=broadcast (
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| distinct ClusterName, Computer, PodUid, TimeGenerated, PodStatus
| summarize TotalCount = count(),
PendingCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Pending"),
RunningCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Running"),
SucceededCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Succeeded"),
FailedCount = sumif(1, PodStatus =~ "Failed")
by ClusterName, bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize)
) on ClusterName, TimeGenerated
| extend UnknownCount = TotalCount - PendingCount - RunningCount - SucceededCount - FailedCount
| project TimeGenerated, ClusterName
TotalCount = todouble(TotalCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
PendingCount = todouble(PendingCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
PendingPercent = round((todouble(PendingCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)), 
RunningCount = todouble(RunningCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
RunningPercent = round((todouble(RunningCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)),
SucceededCount = todouble(SucceededCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
SucceededPercent = round((todouble(SucceededCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)),
FailedCount = todouble(FailedCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
FailedPercent = round((todouble(FailedCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100)),
UnknownCount = todouble(UnknownCount) / ClusterSnapshotCount,
UnknownPercent = round((todouble(UnknownCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100))
| summarize AggregatedValue = avg(UnknownPercent) by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), ClusterName')]

properties.DisplayName: K8S - Cluster nodes disks free space used exceeded (Critical)
properties.Query:
[concat('let clusterId = "', 'K8SResourceId', '";
let endDateTime = now();
let startDateTime = ago(60m);
let trendBinSize = 15m;
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated < endDateTime
| where TimeGenerated >= startDateTime
| where Origin == "container.azm.ms/telegraf" 
| where Namespace == "container.azm.ms/disk" 
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags) 
| project TimeGenerated, ClusterId = Tags["container.azm.ms/clusterId"], Computer = tostring(Tags.hostName), Device = tostring(Tags.device), Path = tostring(Tags.path), DiskMetricName = Name, DiskMetricValue = Val 
| where ClusterId =~ clusterId 
| where DiskMetricName == "used_percent"
| summarize AggregatedValue = max(DiskMetricValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, trendBinSize), Device, Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc')]

[concat('AzureDiagnostics
|wherereplicationProviderName_s=="InMageAzureV2"
|whereisnotempty(name_s)andisnotnull(name_s)
| where tolower(Resource) == "', '__ASRName__', '" 
|projectTimeGenerated, name_s,replicationHealth_s
| where replicationHealth_s == "Critical"
|summarizeAggregatedValue =count()bybin(TimeGenerated, 15m), name_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc')]

[concat('AzureDiagnostics
|wherereplicationProviderName_s=="InMageAzureV2"
|whereisnotempty(name_s)andisnotnull(name_s)
| where tolower(Resource) == "', '__ASRName__', '" 
|projectTimeGenerated, name_s,replicationHealth_s
| where replicationHealth_s == "Warning"
|summarizeAggregatedValue =count()bybin(TimeGenerated, 15m), name_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc')]

[concat('AzureDiagnostics
|wherereplicationProviderName_s=="InMageAzureV2" 
|whereisnotempty(name_s)andisnotnull(name_s)
| where tolower(Resource) == "', '__ASRName__', '" 
|extendRPO = case(rpoInSeconds_d>', '__RPOCritical__', ',"Critical", rpoInSeconds_d', '__RPOWarning__', ',"Warning", "Ok") 
|projectTimeGenerated, name_s, RPO
| where RPO == "Warning"
|summarizeAggregatedValue =count()bybin(TimeGenerated, 15m), name_s 
| order by TimeGenerated')]

[concat('AzureDiagnostics
|wherereplicationProviderName_s=="InMageAzureV2" 
|whereisnotempty(name_s)andisnotnull(name_s)
| where tolower(Resource) == "', '__ASRName__', '" 
|extendRPO = case(rpoInSeconds_d>', '__RPOCritical__', ',"Critical", rpoInSeconds_d', '__RPOWarning__', ',"Warning", "Ok") 
|projectTimeGenerated, name_s, RPO
| where RPO == "Critical"
|summarizeAggregatedValue =count()bybin(TimeGenerated, 15m), name_s 
| order by TimeGenerated')]

properties.DisplayName: ASR - Too many test failovers missing - Warning
properties.Query:
[concat('AzureDiagnostics
|wherereplicationProviderName_s=="InMageAzureV2"
|whereisnotempty(name_s)andisnotnull(name_s)
|whereisnotempty(failoverHealth_s)andisnotnull(failoverHealth_s)
| where tolower(Resource) == "', 'ASRName', '"
|summarizehint.strategy=partitionedarg_max(TimeGenerated, *)byname_s
|projectTimeGenerated, VirtualMachine=name_s,VaultName=Resource ,TestFailoverStatus=failoverHealth_s 
| where TestFailoverStatus == "Critical"
//|summarizeAggregatedValue =count()byTestFailoverStatus
//| order by TimeGenerated asc')]

[concat('AzureDiagnostics
|whereCategory =="AzureSiteRecoveryJobs"
| where tolower(Resource) == "', 'ASRName', '" 
|whereResultType=="Failed"
|summarizeAggregatedValue =count()bybin(TimeGenerated, 30m)')]

[concat('AzureDiagnostics
|wherereplicationProviderName_s=="InMageAzureV2"
| where tolower(Resource) == "asr-test-bvlt"
|whereCategory =="AzureSiteRecoveryReplicatedItems"
|whereisnotempty(name_s)andisnotnull(name_s)
|wherelastSuccessfulTestFailoverTime_t<= ago(90d)
|summarizehint.strategy=partitionedarg_max(TimeGenerated, *)byname_s
|summarizecount()')]

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
Syslog
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| where Facility == "daemon"
| where SeverityLevel in ("emerg","alert","crit")
| summarize AggregatedValue=cnt() by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer')]

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
Syslog
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| where Facility == "daemon"
| where SeverityLevel in ("err","warning")
| summarize AggregatedValue=cnt() by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer')]

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
Syslog
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| where Facility == "kern"
| where SeverityLevel in ("emerg","alert","crit")
| summarize AggregatedValue=cnt() by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer')]

[concat('let ResourceGroupName = "/resourcegroups/', variables('VMRGName'), '/";
Syslog
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName
| where Facility == "kern"

Perf
| where _ResourceId contains ResourceGroupName

Perf

//| where AggregatedValue > 85')]

properties.notes: Storage account should not be deleted.
